text: Artemios "Demis" Ventouris Roussos (, 15 June 1946 â€“ 25 January 2015) was an Egyptian-born Greek singer and performer. He had international hit records as a solo performer in the 1970s after having been a member of Aphrodite's Child. He sold over 60 million albums worldwide and became "an unlikely kaftan- wearing sex symbol". Roussos died in Athens, Greece, aged 68. == Galleri == Demis Roussos 72.jpg|Demis Roussos 1972.
